sub_topic: Determining the diameter of a graph.
message_1:
Consider the following graph:

```
A -- B -- C -- D -- E
    |         |
    F         G
```

What is the diameter of this graph?
message_2: The diameter of a graph is the longest shortest path between any two vertices in the graph. In this case, the longest shortest path is between vertices A and E, which is 4. So, the diameter of this graph is 4.
